content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: RevokeRawLogAccess path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1alpha/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/raw_log_access/{ip} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name ip
desc the ip or cidr with mask /32 to revoke access to waf raw logs
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum revoke raw log access
desc blockcallout

  type danger
  body this is an alpha api call and should be considered very unstable please do not execute this in a production environment see our versioning guidelinesdocversioning for more information

/block
responses
title: 19_Raw Log Access_RevokeRawLogAccess_106.json
